content.meta_description: Shop GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum for brightening, fades dark spots. ₹699. Free shipping available.

hero.headline: Achieve Brightening and More
hero.tagline: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum provides brightening and fades dark spots.

benefits_section.title: Benefits

benefits_list.description: Enhances skin radiance and gives you a natural glow
Helps reduce the appearance of dark spots and uneven skin tone

benefits_section.summary: GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum provides brightening and fades dark spots.

hero_ingredient.name: Vitamin C
hero_ingredient.description: A powerful antioxidant that helps brighten skin and protect against environmental damage.

ingredients_list.name: Vitamin C
ingredients_list.description: A powerful antioxidant that helps brighten skin and protect against environmental damage.

ingredients_list.name: Hyaluronic Acid
ingredients_list.description: A moisture-binding ingredient that can hold up to 1000x its weight in water.

concentration.description: Formulated with 10% Vitamin C for optimal effectiveness

usage_section.title: How to Use
usage_section.quick_guide: Apply 2–3 drops of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum in the morning.

safety_section.title: Safety Information

warnings.description: May cause tingling in some users
Users with sensitive skin should proceed with caution

precautions: Perform a patch test before first use
Keep out of reach of children
Store in a cool, dark place to maintain potency
Use sunscreen during the day as Vitamin C can increase sun sensitivity
Start with less frequent application if you have sensitive skin

patch_test.instructions: Apply a small amount to inner arm and wait 24 hours before full use

pricing_section.title: Pricing
pricing_section.value_proposition: Premium quality at a reasonable price with 2 active ingredients
